title: Tap Troupe
author: Corncavz
pages:
Fun Fact #1: Before
this was built in
Atlantis, I built this
song once before in
Greenland Dome 4. due
to procrastination and
build juggling, I never
finished the song.





Fun Fact #2: The Tall
Tappers (A.K.A. The
Tap Stars) originally
started their
preforming careers
from Space Gramps (a
yellow-boxed
induvidual from Rhythm
Tengoku (and is also a
book picture in Remix
7)) based off of their
looks alone.

Fun Fact #3: Rhythm
Heaven Megamix is the
Super Smash Bros. of
Rhythm Heaven. The
best games from the
entire franchise are
all put together in this
massive lump for the
Nintendo 3DS. The
game is 70% from
Fever, but somehow
Tap Troupe never
made it in.
Fun Fact #4: Tap
Troupe has become
sort of a meme using
the "every time X, then
Y" format, this time
using every time the
Tall Tappers shout:
"OKAY"





Fun Fact #5: Tap
Troupe is a "keep the
beat" rhythm game,
which demands you to
"keep the beat" with
several changes in
rhythm.






Fun Fact #6: This used
to be my favorite
rhythm game.










Fun Fact #7: RT, if you
are reading this, I
just want you to know
that I appreciate all
the things you do and
it's really surreal to
see my stuff in your
videos.





Fun Fact #8: Fun Fact
#7 was not very fun.
